member.name: M:CleverDevicesEx.Program.UnhandledExceptionTrapper(System.Object,System.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs)
member.summary: The UnhandledExceptionTrapper() method sets up a system-wide exception trapper that will catch all exceptions that occur after the code execution enters the Main() method. The errors will be displayed in the console output window and the application will let the user know that it will exit.

member.name: M:CleverDevicesEx.Program.RunSentenceReverserTest
member.summary: Acquire a string of words and return a string with the words in reversed order.

member.name: M:CleverDevicesEx.Program.RunStackTest
member.summary: Implement a class that uses the Stack of T functionality that is built into the dotNet framework. Includes support for Push, Pop, Peek and Size

member.name: M:CleverDevicesEx.Program.RunCustomStackTest
member.summary: A custom implementation of the built in C# Stack object, using an array. Demonstrates support for PUSH, POP and PEEK methods.

member.name: M:CleverDevicesEx.Program.RunFindCommonLettersInTwoStringsTest
member.summary: Acquire two strings of letters and find the letters that are common between both

member.name: M:CleverDevicesEx.Program.RunFibonacciSequenceTest
member.summary: This method acquires an integer input and then computes a fibonacci sequnce for it. The fibonacci sequence is returns as a list of ints

member.name: M:CleverDevicesEx.Program.RunactorsTest
member.summary: This test takes in one number an produces a sequence of "factors". Factors of a number are all those numbers that can divide evenly into the number with no remainder.
